Megaton took himself a tour of the Predacons arctic base. He saw great poss=
ibilities for purposes. By now he'd used his rank and priveleges to learn a=
ll he could about his teammates. He'd studied the files, he watched the rec=
ords and studied the tactics of the bots he was working with. The time was =
growing short, he could sense the friction in the air.  The mutant stepped =
outside, opened a comm to his commander 

"Megatron, I'm weary from being c=
ouped up. You will call me if anything needs discussed yes?" The oversized =
pieces parts of a transformer transformed to his dragon mode and flew off i=
nto the cold sky knowing that Megatrons rule would one day end and it would=
 be his day to shine.

  From: JP3884@aol.=

 Scorpinox questioningly. THe

ook.
